== Description ==
Retrieve thumbnail for an attachment. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php wp_get_attachment_thumb_file( $attachment_id ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$attachment_id|integer|Attachment ID.|optional|0}}

== Return Values ==
{{Return||string&#124;boolean|False on failure. Thumbnail file path on success.}}
